topics.topic_html:
# IUBAT Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center (IIEC) The **IUBAT Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center (IIEC)** serves as a dynamic hub for fostering creativity, technological innovation, and entrepreneurial spirit among students at the **International University of Business Agriculture and Technology (IUBAT)**. Established to bridge the gap between academic learning and real-world application, IIEC provides a platform for students to transform their ideas into viable projects and startups. --- ## üéØ Mission and Vision IIEC's mission is to guide students from conceptualizing innovative ideas to developing comprehensive business models. The center emphasizes hands-on experience, offering mentorship and resources through its **Innovation Incubator Lab**. This approach not only nurtures student creativity but also aligns with the **Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)**, encouraging solutions that address global challenges. --- ## üîë Key Activities - **Annual Innovation Competitions** Organizes intra-university and national events like the *Technocrats* series to showcase student ingenuity. - **Workshops and Seminars** Regular training in robotics, AI, and business development. - **Project Incubation** Selected projects receive funding, mentorship, and local patent opportunities. - **National and International Exposure** Encourages participation in expos and competitions to enhance recognition and networking. --- ## üèÜ Notable Achievements - **Technocrats V.1 (2023)** National event attracting 70+ teams focused on digital innovation. - **Technocrats V.2 (2024)** Over 200 teams from 120+ institutions; included Drone Racing and Hackathons. - **International Skill Innovation Fest 2024** IIEC secured **1st Runner-Up** at IUT's prestigious global event. --- ## üî¨ Ongoing Projects - **Blind Assistance Glasses** Wearable device aiding visually impaired users via object detection and feedback. - **Prosthetic Bionic Hand** Affordable 3D-printed prosthetic controlled by myoelectric sensors. - **Automation Window System** Sensor-based window operation system enhancing energy efficiency. --- ## üìå Conclusion The **IUBAT Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center (IIEC)** is at the forefront of nurturing Bangladesh‚Äôs next generation of innovators and entrepreneurs. By offering a full ecosystem of support ‚Äî from ideation to implementation ‚Äî IIEC empowers students to make meaningful contributions to society and the economy. --- üîó Learn more: [iubat.edu/iiec](https://iubat.edu/iiec/)

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

// Structure to represent a department with its programs
struct Department {
    string name;
    vector<string> programs;
};

// Structure to represent student statistics
struct StudentStats {
    int undergraduate;
    int postgraduate;
    int doctoral;

    int total() const {
        return undergraduate + postgraduate + doctoral;
    }
};

// Function to display student statistics
void displayStudentStats(const StudentStats& stats) {
    cout << "Student Statistics:" << endl;
    cout << "Undergraduate: " << stats.undergraduate << endl;
    cout << "Postgraduate: " << stats.postgraduate << endl;
    cout << "Doctoral: " << stats.doctoral << endl;
    cout << "Total Students: " << stats.total() << endl;
}

// Function to display department info
void displayDepartments(const vector<Department>& departments) {
    cout << "\nDepartments and Programs Offered:" << endl;
    for (const auto& dept : departments) {
        cout << "Department: " << dept.name << endl;
        for (const auto& program : dept.programs) {
            cout << "  - " << program << endl;
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    // Define student statistics
    StudentStats stats = {7792, 199, 15};

    // Define departments and their programs
    vector<Department> departments = {
        {"College of Business Administration", {"BBA", "MBA"}},
        {"College of Engineering and Technology", {
            "BCSE", "BSCE", "BSEEE", "BSME", "DSCE"
        }},
        {"College of Arts and Sciences", {
            "BAEcon", "BA in English", "Languages", "Quantitative Sciences",
            "Physical Sciences", "Humanities", "Social Sciences", 
            "Biological Sciences", "Chemistry"
        }},
        {"College of Nursing", {"BSN"}},
        {"College of Agriculture Science", {"BSAg"}},
        {"College of Tourism and Hospitality Management", {"BATHM"}},
        {"Faculty of Public Health", {"MPH"}}
    };

    // Display information
    displayStudentStats(stats);
    displayDepartments(departments);

    return 0;
}
